scalar:array.comment: /** * Swift Mailer Recipient List Container * Please read the LICENSE file * @copyright Chris Corbyn <chris@w3style.co.uk> * @author Chris Corbyn <chris@w3style.co.uk> * @package Swift * @license GNU Lesser General Public License */
/** * Swift's Recipient List container. Contains To, Cc, Bcc * @package Swift * @author Chris Corbyn <chris@w3style.co.uk> */
/** * The recipients in the To: header * @var array */
/** * The recipients in the Cc: header * @var array */
/** * The recipients in the Bcc: header * @var array */

/** * Iterators to use when getting lists back out. * If any iterators are present here, their relevant "addXX()" methods will be useless. * As per the last note, any iterators need to be pre-configured before Swift::send() is called. * @var array,Swift_Iterator */
/** * Add a recipient. * @param string The address * @param string The name * @param string The field (to, cc or bcc) */
/** * Remove a recipient. * @param string The address * @param string The field (to, cc or bcc) */
/** * Get an iterator object for all the recipients in the given field. * @param string The field name (to, cc or bcc) * @return Swift_Iterator */
/** * Override the loading of the default iterator (Swift_ArrayIterator) and use the one given here. * @param Swift_Iterator The iterator to use. It must be populated already. */
/** * Add a To: recipient * @param mixed The address to add. Can be a string or Swift_Address * @param string The personal name, optional */
/** * Get an array of addresses in the To: field * The array contains Swift_Address objects * @return array */
/** * Remove a To: recipient from the list * @param mixed The address to remove. Can be Swift_Address or a string */
/** * Add a Cc: recipient * @param mixed The address to add. Can be a string or Swift_Address * @param string The personal name, optional */
/** * Get an array of addresses in the Cc: field * The array contains Swift_Address objects * @return array */
/** * Remove a Cc: recipient from the list * @param mixed The address to remove. Can be Swift_Address or a string */
/** * Add a Bcc: recipient * @param mixed The address to add. Can be a string or Swift_Address * @param string The personal name, optional */
/** * Get an array of addresses in the Bcc: field * The array contains Swift_Address objects * @return array */
/** * Remove a Bcc: recipient from the list * @param mixed The address to remove. Can be Swift_Address or a string */
/** * Swift's Recipient List container. Contains To, Cc, Bcc * @package Swift * @author Chris Corbyn <chris@w3style.co.uk> */
